item.title: Charles Clarence Drake
item.description: When Drake, Charles Clarence was born in 1868, in Spring Brook, Wisconsin his father, Drake, Charles John, was 33 and his mother, Lanhart, Mary Ann, was 28. He married LeGrant, Etta on 3 July 1886, in Dunn, Wisconsin. They were the parents of at least 5 sons and 3 daughters. He lived in Stockbridge, Wisconsin for about 10 years and Butte, Montana, United States in 1930. He died on 12 March 1931, in Gregson, Montana, at the age of 63, and was buried in Gregson, Montana.
